00049 //
00050 // RawScorerNodeExtractor.hpp
00051 //
00052 // 5 March 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_RAWSCORERNODEEXTRACTOR_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_RAWSCORERNODEEXTRACTOR_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/Walker.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/QuerySpec.hpp"
00060 
00061 class RawScorerNodeExtractor : public indri::lang::Walker {
00062 private:
00063   std::vector<indri::lang::RawScorerNode*> _scorerNodes;
00064   std::vector<indri::lang::Node*> _reachableNodes;
00065   int _insideCount;
00066 
00067 public:
00068   void defaultBefore( indri::lang::Node* n ) {
00069     if( _insideCount ) {
00070       _reachableNodes.push_back(n);
00071     }
00072   }
00073 
00074   void before( indri::lang::RawScorerNode* node ) {
00075     _insideCount++;
00076     _scorerNodes.push_back(node);
00077     _reachableNodes.push_back(node);
00078   }
00079 
00080   void after( indri::lang::RawScorerNode* node ) {
00081     _insideCount--;
00082   }
00083 
00084   std::vector<indri::lang::RawScorerNode*>& getScorerNodes() {
00085     return _scorerNodes;
00086   }
00087 
00088   std::vector<indri::lang::Node*>& getReachableNodes() {
00089     return _reachableNodes;
00090   }
00091 };
00092 
00093 #endif // INDRI_RAWSCORERNODEEXTRACTOR_HPP
00094
